The /alpha/{id}/prices/bids/create API accepts requests in the following format:

/alpha/{id}/prices/bids/create Method
id string
Unique id hash of an Alpha published to the marketplace.
good-until number
Timestamp greater than 1 hour in the future when the bid expires.
shared number
Optional. Optional shared bid price for the alpha per month in USD. Minimum: 0
exclusive number
Optional. Optional exclusive bid price for the alpha per month in USD. Minimum: 0
Example 
{
  "id": "string",
  "good-until": 0,
  "shared": 0,
  "exclusive": 0,
}
